title: Online Learning Network Design for Language Practical Competency Enhancement: Focused on Text Analysis, Writing, and Feedback

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level specialized knowledge (grammar and vocabulary comprehension) and problem-solving skills
context.additional_context: Establishes a network-based learning environment to enhance workplace applicability for current practitioners, including language practice modules specialized for corporate document writing, business communication, and multilingual collaboration scenarios.

learning_goals: Learners will enhance their capacity to design and execute language projects (text analysis, report writing, etc.) using online collaboration tools.
Learners will improve language practical tasks (writing, translation, presentations, etc.) by ≥85% through peer feedback and formative assessments.

Learners will use corporate LMS and online collaboration tools to establish a self-directed monthly learning plan (vocabulary expansion, grammar review, expression diversification) over six months, achieving ≥80% weekly execution rates and submitting monthly performance reports (including learning content, time investment, and improvements).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
